Krisztián Hofstädter

acousmatic programming

A music release featuring acousmatic music and experimental electronica.

time: Mar 2009

tags: music, music-release, electronic-music, SuperCollider, Max

These pieces were influenced by my lecturers @ the Anglia Ruskin University, Cambridge: Julio d’Escriván, Tom Hall and Richard Hoadley. Some pieces were featured in the Oxford Sonic Art Jukebox.

tools: SuperCollider, Max/MSP, Logic and ixiQuark
